Text:
Hi, nice release BUT there seems to be a problem with the audio : the music (and maybe others) track has a volume way lower than the others (like if the audio was ripped from a 5-channel dvd but not all channels were used for the rip)
It's quite annoying since music plays a great part in the show ambience.
For those having the tv-rips they can compare it.

Is there a way to have a proper made?
